freemarker.core

类 _CoreAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • freemarker.core._CoreAPI

  • public class _CoreAPI
extends Object
    For internal use only; don't depend on this, there's no backward compatibility guarantee at all! This class is to work around the lack of module system in Java, i.e., so that other FreeMarker packages can access things inside this package that users shouldn't.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSupportedBuiltInNames

        public static Set<String> getSupportedBuiltInNames(int namingConvention)
        Returns the names of the currently supported "built-ins" (expr?builtin_name-like things).
        参数:
        namingConvention - One of Configuration.AUTO_DETECT_NAMING_CONVENTION, Configuration.LEGACY_NAMING_CONVENTION, and Configuration.CAMEL_CASE_NAMING_CONVENTION. If it's Configuration.AUTO_DETECT_NAMING_CONVENTION then the union of the names in all the naming conventions is returned.

      • ensureIsTemplateModelException

        public static TemplateModelException ensureIsTemplateModelException(String modelOpMsg,
                                                                    TemplateException e)
        The work around the problematic cases where we should throw a TemplateException, but we are inside a TemplateModel method and so we can only throw TemplateModelException-s.
